summary: A simpleton who happens to be a vampire!
descriptionHtml:
My follower mod. Nothing special, just a simple guy who happens to be a vampire. Had loads of plans for this but my inability to work with quests and dialogues has led to this simpleton. 
He is located at Dragonsreach, on the upper right balcony (image added to show location).

PS: If anyone wants to use this follower in their quest or in any other things, feel free to do so. Just don't forget to credit le creator :3

author: vvalentine73
